*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6b5b0d767335 ***

os: make sure Remove returns correct error on windows

R=golang-dev, bsiegert, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5493078

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On 2011/12/19 15:52:52, rsc wrote:
> 
> You probably need to copy the code into file_plan9.go too.

No, I don't think so. Plan9 has its own copy of os.Remove in file_plan9.go that just calls syscall.Remove. I am not changing that.

Alex

LGTM

You probably need to copy the code into file_plan9.go too.
